webEdition Version 6.2.1.

webEdition is a web content management system licensed under the GPL
For system requirements, installation and upgrade details, see the files INSTALL and the informations available on our website

http://www.webedition.org

see webEdition/license folder for license informations
see INSTALL for quick installation instructions

We recommend to use the latest OnlineInstaller instead of this tarball setup, because the OnlineInstaller has much more features and is much faster.
The OnlineInstaller is available at http://download.webedition.org/releases/
or at https://sourceforge.net/projects/webedition/files/webEdition%20OnlineInstaller/
